VZUG.SW.summary: V-ZUG Holding AG manufactures and sells various household appliances in Switzerland and internationally. The company operates through Household Appliances and Real Estate segments. It provides kitchen appliances, including ovens and cookers, hobs, combi-steam cookers and steam ovens, dishwashers, refrigerators, range hoods, microwaves, drawers, and coffee centers; and laundry appliances comprising washing machines, dryers, refreshbutlers, and till systems. The company also offers oven, cooker, and steam cooker accessories; refrigerator, dishwasher, range hood, tumble dryer, washing machine, and vacuisine accessories; and recipe books. In addition, it operates land and buildings. The company was founded in 1913 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.
